adsorption is computed during GCMC using the particle
prevent the insertion of gas molecules in nonaccessible pores.
COFs with null probe-occupiable accessible pore volume are
considered nonporous, and for these materials the isotherms
Finally, we used the in-house code from the work of Huck et
to compute the optimal parameters for the temper-
pressure swing process, the parasitic energy, the working

The Supporting Information is available free of charge on the
Comparison of the cell optimization protocol with other
variants, detailed description of the isotherm sampling
protocol, detailed discussion on the contribution of
charges and optimization to the CO
interactions, and a detailed comparison of experimental
The authors declare no competing ﬁnancial interest.
The research in this article was supported by the European
Research Council (ERC) under the European Union’s
agreement 666983, MaGic) and by the NCCR MARVEL,
funded by the Swiss National Science Foundation. L.T.
acknowledges the support of the swissuniversities P-5
calculations were enabled by the Swiss National Super-
computing Centre (CSCS), under project ID s761. The
authors are grateful to Prof. J. Hutter for the helpful
discussions, to the CP2K user forum, and to the AiiDA
developers team for the support. Materials Cloud Archive:
Additional data are provided free of charge on the Materials
, including the AiiDA WorkChains used in this
work; the AiiDA provenance graph; and the CURATED
COF structures in CIF format. The archive record links to a
DISCOVER section, where the structures and the main results
of this work can be browsed interactively, as well as to an
EXPLORE section with the interactive provenance browser
